e="preserve">Daniel Goldman (October 30, 1939 – April 12, 2020) was an American actor and casting director. He was known as the voice of Brainy Smurf in Hanna-Barbera's "The Smurfs" (1981–1989) and as the medical student in the opening scene of "Young Frankenstein" (1974). Goldman was born in New York City.
Goldman died on April 12, 2020 in Los Angeles from problems caused by multiple strokes, aged 80.
